content.query:
create DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL CredAccessKey
WITH IDENTITY = 'storagegen2kr',
SECRET = 'hrZhQs/4WzYLzXzeedTOPwXMyd1c+gIp43kiU0r7PlI3SBhMIcpVAEFED+ng0J/gmqTFVyFkkwE/+AStnGtm0g=='
;


create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ds_log_data_4 
with (LOCATION='abfss://csv-container@storagegen2kr.dfs.core.windows.net',
        CREDENTIAL = CredAccessKey,
        TYPE=HADOOP);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TextFileFormat WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS(
        FIELD_TERMINATOR=',',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
)
;

drop EXTERNAL TABLE logdata_csv;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata_csv]
(
    [Correlation id] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operation name] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Event category] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Event initiated by] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource type] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource group] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL)
WITH(
    LOCATION = '/Log.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=ds_log_data_4,
    FILE_FORMAT=TextFileFormat
);

select * from logdata_csv;
